title: USA TODAY Bestsellers
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION USA TODAY Bestsellers 
1. "See Me" by Nicholas Sparks (Grand Central Publishing) 
2. "Magnus Chase and the Gods of Asgard" by Rick Riordan (Disney-Hyperion) 
3. "The Martian" by Andy Weir (Crown) 
4. "Killing Reagan" by Bill O'Reilly (Henry Holt and Co.) 
5. "The Amazing Book Is Not on Fire" by Dan Howell and Phil Lester (Random House Books for Young Readers) 
6. "Humans of New York:Stories" by Brandon Stanton (St. Martin's Press) 
7. "The Survivor" by Vince Flynn (Atria/Emily Bestler Books) 
8. "Twilight and Life and Death Dual Edition" by Stephanie Meyer (Little, Brown Books for Young Readers) 
9. "The Murder House" by James Patterson and David Ellis (Little, Brown) 
10. "Foreign Affairs" by Stuart Woods (G.P. Putnam's Sons) 
11. "A More Perfect Union" by Ben Carson and Candy Carson (Sentinel) 
12. "The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up" by Marie Kondo (Ten Speed) 
13. "The Girl in the Spider's Web" by David Lagercrantz (Knopf) 
14. "Make Me" by Lee Child (Delacorte) 
15. "Pretty Girls" by Karin Slaughter (William Morrow) 
16. "Room on the Broom" by Julia Donaldson and Axel Scheffler (Puffin) 
17. "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins (Riverhead) 
18. "Gray Mountain" by John Grisham (Dell) 
19. "Hell's Foundations Quiver" by David Weber (Tor) 
20. "Wrong" by Jana Aston (Rutherford Press) 
21. "All the Light We Cannot See" by Anthony Doerr (Scribner) 
22. "City on Fire" by Garth Risk Hallberg (Knopf) 
23. "After You" by Jojo Moyes (Pamela Dorman Books) 
24. "The Power of I Am" by Joel Osteen (Faith Words) 
25. "The Walking Dead Compendium Volume 3" by Robert Kirkman and Charlie Adlard (Image Comics) 
Reporting stores include: Amazon.com, Amazon Kindle, Barnes & Noble.com, Barnes & Noble Inc., Barnes & Noble e-books, BooksAMillion.com, Books-A-Million, Bookland and Books & Co., Costco, Davis-Kidd Booksellers (Nashville, Memphis), Hudson Booksellers, Joseph-Beth Booksellers (Lexington, Ky.; Cincinnati, Charlotte, Cleveland, Pittsburgh), Kobo, Inc., Powell's Books (Portland, Ore.), Powells.com, R.J. Julia Booksellers (Madison, Conn.), Schuler Books & Music (Grand Rapids, Okemos, Eastwood, Alpine, Mich.), Sony Reader Store, Target, Tattered Cover Book Store (Denver).
